sen.e: MINAMOTO no Toshifusa (1035-December 23, 1121) was a kuge (Japanese aristocratic class or noble man) in the late Heian period.

sen.j: 父は源師房、母は藤原道長の娘藤原尊子。
sen.e: His father was MINAMOTO no Morofusa and his mother was FUJIWARA no Takako [Sonshi], a daughter of FUJIWARA no Michinaga.

sen.j: 後冷泉天皇から鳥羽天皇まで5代の天皇に仕え、検非違使別当・左衛門督・左近衛大将参議・大納言・右大臣を経て1083年（永保3年）従一位左大臣に至った。
sen.e: He was serving the emperors of five generations from Emperor Goreizei to Emperor Toba, and finally promoted to Juichii (Junior First Rank) sadaijin (minister of the left) in 1083 after serving as Kebiishi no betto (Superintendent of the Imperial Police), Saemon no kami (Captain of the Left Division of Outer Palace Guards), Sakone no daisho (Major Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards), Sangi (Royal Advisors), Dainagon (Major Counselor) and udaijin (minister of the right.)

sen.j: 朝廷での儀式に関する有職故実にくわしく、村上源氏の最盛期を築いたが、1113年（永久 (元号)元年）子で後三条天皇の皇子輔仁親王の護持僧をつとめた仁寛が鳥羽天皇の暗殺を企てたとされ、弟の源顕房に村上源氏の主流を譲った。
sen.e: He was very familiar with yosoku kojitsu (well-versed in usages or practices of the court or military households (practices)) in the imperial court and brought about best days for the Murakami-Genji (Minamoto clan), but in 1113 Ninkan who was serving as gojiso (budhist exorcists) for Imperial Prince Sukehito of Emperor Gosanjo was believed to plan the assassination of Emperor Toba, and handed over the position of head for Murakami-Genji to his younger brother MINAMOTO no Akifusa.
sen.cmt: There is no statement about the relation of Ninkan and MINAMOTO no Toshifusa here.

sen.j: 正室の後朱雀天皇皇女娟子内親王とは始め許しもなく密通・駆け落ち騒動を引き起こし、内親王の弟尊仁親王（後三条天皇）の怒りを買ったが、彼女との間に子はできなかった。
sen.e: MINAMOTO no Toshifusa first caused a disturbance by having an affair with Imperial Princess Kenshi of Emperor Gosuzaku, who became seishitsu (an official wife) for him, and running away with her without Emperor Gosuzaku's approval, that triggered furies of Imperial Prince Takahito (later, Emperor Gosanjo), Imperial Princess Kenshi's brother, and did not have a child with her.

sen.j: その後源実基女、源基平女らとの間に多くの子女をもうけ、そのうち娘の方子は藤原長実と結婚、藤原得子を産んでいる。
